Subject: Invitation to Share Global Holiday Traditions on "Holiday Traditions Around the World"

Hi Dr. Patel,

I hope you’re doing well. My name is Jordan Rivers, host of the podcast "Culture Compass." We’re producing a holiday‑special episode titled **"Holiday Traditions Around the World"** and would love to feature you as our guest.

Your extensive research on holiday rituals and the insightful paper you published on seasonal celebrations (see https://example.com/maya-paper) aligns perfectly with the episode’s focus on how different cultures celebrate the festive season. Our listeners, who are especially interested in cultural stories and traditions (they rank "culture" as their top listening interest), would greatly benefit from your expertise.

The episode would be a 45‑minute conversation recorded remotely at your convenience, and we’ll promote the episode across our social channels and newsletter (which reaches over 5,000 subscribers). We can also provide a small honorarium for your time if that’s of interest.

Would you be available for a chat sometime in the next two weeks? I’m happy to work around your schedule.

Looking forward to the possibility of having you on the show!

Best regards,
Jordan Rivers
Host, Culture Compass
jordan@culturecompasspod.com
